attractions.name: Chapultepec Castle
attractions.address: Bosque de Chapultepec I Secc, Miguel Hidalgo, 11100 CDMX
attractions.description: A historic castle on a hill offering panoramic views of Mexico City and rich collections of art and history.

attractions.name: Zócalo - Plaza de la Constitución
attractions.description: One of the largest city squares in the world, surrounded by iconic buildings and full of cultural life.

attractions.name: Palacio de Bellas Artes
attractions.description: A stunning marble palace and the cultural heart of the city with murals, ballet, and opera.

attractions.name: Templo Mayor
attractions.description: The ruins of the main temple of the ancient Mexica (Aztec) capital, right in downtown Mexico City.

attractions.name: Coyoacán
attractions.description: A charming neighborhood with cobblestone streets, artisan markets, and the famous Frida Kahlo Museum.

attractions.name: Xochimilco Canals
attractions.description: Colorful boats (trajineras) cruise through the ancient canals of this UNESCO World Heritage site.

attractions.name: Soumaya Museum
attractions.description: A modern art museum with a futuristic silver design, housing works by Rodin, Dalí, and more.

attractions.name: Torre Latinoamericana
attractions.description: An iconic skyscraper offering sweeping views of Mexico City from its observation deck.
